name: api-gateway-with-custom-domain
description: Repository from blog [exanubes.com](https://exanubes.com) for [Creating API Gateway with custom domain](https://exanubes.com/blog/create-api-gateway-with-custom-domain).

scripts.cdk:deploy: npx cdk destroy --app .aws-sam/build --all --role-arn=arn:aws:iam::$(aws sts get-caller-identity --query 'Account' --output text):role/exanubes-cloudformation-access
scripts.cdk:destroy: npx cdk deploy --app .aws-sam/build --all --role-arn=arn:aws:iam::$(aws sts get-caller-identity --query 'Account' --output text):role/exanubes-cloudformation-access

author: exanubes.com
